name: SSF2
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 2
subtitle: OBSOLETE - Clinical Assessment of Regional Lymph Nodes
notes:
**Note**:  This CS Site-Specific Factor is obsolete beginning with CS Version 2 (codes, code descriptions, and notes).  Old data are retained during conversion, but new cases are not coded 000-888 or 999.  Use code 988 for this field.

**OBSOLETE V0200 Note**:  In the rare instance that the number of clinically positive nodes is stated but a clinical N category is not stated, code 1-3 nodes as 100 (N1), and 4 or more nodes as 200 (N2).
rows:
OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Nodes not clinically evident

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Clinically N2

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200
